items.sentence: Tom found out later that the woman he met in the park was Mary.
Tom gave Mary a diamond bracelet for their wedding anniversary.
Tom gave Mary some advice on how to pass multiple-choice tests.
Tom got the guards drunk and managed to escape from the castle.
Tom groped for the flashlight that had fallen behind the couch.
I wonder whether Tom will be able to do that by himself or not.
I wonder whether or not Tom will be able to do that by himself.
Have you ever thought about donating your organs after you die?
He went to the store at the last minute, just before it closed.
I always order the daily special when I eat at this restaurant.
Tom and Mary soon realized that they shouldn\'t have done that.
Tom and Mary were both fired because they couldn\'t be trusted.
You\'ve got to be pretty patient to teach someone how to drive.
Every successful writer has a drawer full of rejection letters.
One thousand dollars will cover all the expenses for the party.
One way or another, we have to get this job finished by Monday.

Do you think I don\'t know what you and Tom were talking about?
Tom couldn\'t remember the name of the place where he met Mary.
